snippet: Sweeping legislation that cleared the State House of Representatives this week is an assault on safe abortion care and on the clinics that provide it.
abstract: Editorial deplores proposed legislation in Michigan's Republican-led State Legislature, which contains several constitutionally questionable restrictions that add up to an egregious attack on safe abortion care and on the clinics that provide it.
lead_paragraph: Sweeping legislation that cleared the State House of Representatives this week is an assault on safe abortion care and on the clinics that provide it.
